db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: BoxPlotSeries represents a series of data shown as box-and-whiskers bars. The purpose of this class is to act as a container for single box-and-whiskers items. Each item is drawn to own slot. If chart includes multiple instances of BoxPlotSeries then box-and-whiskers items with the same index are drawn to same slot.

db:note.db:para: The slot, each item in BoxPlotSeries is drawn, represents a category in BarCategoryAxis. The category labels have to be unique. If same category label is defined for several box-and-whisker items only the first one is drawn.

db:section.db:para: The following QML shows how to create a simple box-and-whiskers chart:

db:section.db:title: axisX : AbstractAxis
db:section.db:para: The x axis used for the series. If you leave both axisX and axisXTop undefined, a BarCategoriesAxis is created for the series.

db:section.db:title: axisXTop : AbstractAxis
db:section.db:para: The x axis used for the series, drawn on top of the chart view. Note that you can only provide either axisX or axisXTop, but not both.

db:section.db:title: axisY : AbstractAxis
db:section.db:para: The y axis used for the series. If you leave both axisY and axisYRight undefined, a ValueAxis is created for the series.

db:section.db:title: axisYRight : AbstractAxis
db:section.db:para: The y axis used for the series, drawn to the right on the chart view. Note that you can only provide either axisY or axisYRight, but not both.

db:section.db:title: boxOutlineVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: This property configures the visibility of the middle box outline.

db:section.db:title: boxWidth : qreal
db:section.db:para: This property configures the width of the box-and-whiskers item. The value signifies the relative width of the box-and-whiskers item inside its own slot. The value can between 0.0 and 1.0. Negative values are clamped to 0.0 and values over 1.0 are clamped to 1.0.

db:section.db:title: brush : Brush
db:section.db:para: This property configures the brush of the box-and-whiskers items.

db:section.db:title: brushFilename : QString
db:section.db:para: The name of the file used as a brush for the series.

db:section.db:title: count : int
db:section.db:para: The count of sets in series.

db:section.db:title: pen : Pen
db:section.db:para: This property configures the pen of the box-and-whiskers items.

db:section.db:title: onAxisXChanged(AbstractAxis axis)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when there is change in X axis.

db:section.db:title: onAxisXTopChanged(AbstractAxis axis)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when there is change in top X axis.

db:section.db:title: onAxisYChanged(AbstractAxis axis)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when there is change in Y axis.

db:section.db:title: onAxisYRightChanged(AbstractAxis axis)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when there is change in Y right axis.

db:section.db:title: onBoxOutlineVisibilityChanged()
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the middle box outline visibility is changed.

db:section.db:title: onBoxWidthChanged()
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the width of the box-and-whiskers item is changed.

db:section.db:title: onBoxsetsAdded()
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when new box-and-whiskers sets are added to the series.

db:section.db:title: onBoxsetsRemoved()
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when new box-and-whiskers sets are removed from the series.

db:section.db:title: onBrushChanged()
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the brush for box-and-whiskers items has changed.

db:section.db:title: onClicked(BoxSet boxset)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the user clicks the boxset on the chart.

db:section.db:title: onCountChanged()
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when there is change in count of box-and-whiskers items in the series.

db:section.db:title: onDoubleClicked(BoxSet boxset)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user doubleclicks the boxset on the chart.

db:section.db:title: onHovered(bool status, BoxSet boxset)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when there is change in hover status over boxset.

db:section.db:title: onPenChanged()
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the pen for box-and-whiskers items has changed.

db:section.db:title: onPressed(BoxSet boxset)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user presses the boxset on the chart.

db:section.db:title: onReleased(BoxSet boxset)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user releases the boxset on the chart.

db:section.db:title: append(BoxSet box)
db:section.db:para: Appends the box to the series.

db:section.db:title: append(string label, VariantList values)
db:section.db:para: Appends a new box-and-whiskers set with label and values to the series.

db:section.db:title: clear()
db:section.db:para: Removes all boxsets from the series. Deletes removed sets.

db:section.db:title: insert(int index, string label, VariantList values)
db:section.db:para: Inserts a new box-and-whiskers set with label and values at the index position.

db:section.db:title: remove(QBoxSet boxset)
db:section.db:para: Removes the boxset from the series.
